title: Unable to connect to games
body: Tryed to play my first game today, and when i got past champ select my client dropped immediately and the reconect button appeard. When i clicked it nothing happened. Can someone help?

replies.body: Your network might have just had a small hiccup during that game, so but just to be safe let's first double check you [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there. Test it out in a practice game and hit me back up if this keeps happening.
Its still happeneing, ive even turned off my firewall to see if it was blocking, but it didn't work.

Straaaaaange. Let's go ahead and get you a little more detailed help from our tech guys. Use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to generate some logs and shoot those over in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they can look over them!
It's alright now, i had unistalled the game and reinstalled it and the problem is gone. Anyways thanks for your time sir.(Or Mis)

Hey, the report function on the boards doesn't seem to be working. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/xgFRfUP9-psa-if-you-die-to-your-lane-oppenent clearly belongs in player behavior, but has not been moved. Haven't gotten a response from player support, so I'm just going to the first red post from a player support rioter I could find.

And is there an issue happening pertaining to game connection that only happens for draft pick? A friend of mine keeps disconnecting at the start, but it doesn't happen in other modes.
